import { BiGlobe, BiImage, BiLike, BiRepost, BiSmile, BiSortDown, BiX } from 'react-icons/bi'; import './Post.css'; import { CgComment } from 'react-icons/cg'; import { BsSend, BsThreeDots } from 'react-icons/bs'; import Profile from '../assets/profile.jpeg'; import { useState } from 'react'; import LikeAction from '../assets/like-hover/like.svg'; import IdeaAction from '../assets/like-hover/idea.svg'; import LoveAction from '../assets/like-hover/love.svg'; import SupportAction from '../assets/like-hover/support.svg'; import FunnyAction from '../assets/like-hover/Funny.svg'; import axiosInstance from '../api/axiosInstance'; const Post = ({post}) => { const [commentFocus, setCommentFocus] = useState(false); const [openComment, setOpenComment] = useState(false); const [commentContent , setCommentContent] = useState(''); console.log(post,'post'); const CommentOpen = () => { setOpenComment(true); } const handleComment = async({postId,content}) => { const comment = { post:post._id, content:commentContent }; const res = await axiosInstance.post('/comment',comment); setCommentContent(''); } return (
